Title: #376: Keeping Your Dream Alive with Drew Holcomb
Description:
As many an entrepreneur will tell you, what originally starts as a dream opportunity can all too often turn into a never-ending nightmare. But Drew Holcomb refused to let his story play out that way. Rather than simply focusing on the creative side of his career over the past 15 years, the singer/songwriter doubled down on infrastructure to build a thriving business (in an extremely competitive industry, no less). Tune in as Drew shares how he balances priorities and navigates change, and what he loves most about his job.
